mapper.select: select count(1) from t_course_chapter where is_delete = 0 and course_id = #{courseId}

select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.course_id as courseId,s.name as name,s.chapter_number as chapterNumber, tc.name as courseName from t_course_chapter s left join t_course tc on s.course_id = tc.id where s.is_delete = 0 and s.course_id = #{courseId} and s.chapter_number = #{chapterNumber}
